Title: HTTP headers weakness in company-domain.com web server
Description: X-FRAME-OPTIONS, X-XSS-PROTECTION, X-CONTENT-TYPE-OPTIONS and CONTENT-SECURITY-POLICY headers were not sent by the server, which makes it vulnerable for various attack vectors

Title: HTTP headers weakness in company-domain.de web server
Description: X-XSS-PROTECTION and CONTENT-SECURITY-POLICY headers were not sent by the server, which makes it vulnerable for various attack vectors

Title: Problem in a company login page SSL certificate was detected
Description: Problem in the SSL certificate of a company login page was detected. The login page might not be encrypted properly. Unencrypted login pages expose their users to various kinds of attacks, such as man-in-the-middle attacks, since the credentials are sent in plain text.

Title: No DMARC Quarantine or Reject Policy for company domain
Description: Company domain has a DMARC record but lacks a Quarantine or Reject Policy. Lack of Quarantine or Reject Policy exposes the given domain to spoofing. It is recommended to set a Quarantine or Reject policy on the domain's DMARC record.

Title: Open ports have been detected on company's IP
Description: Open ports have been detected on company's IP. These ports should not be open and might expose the company's servers to potential attacks. Please block access to these ports in your firewall. Further investigation is required.IP: 172.185.24.248, Port(s): 123, 179

Title: HTTP headers weakness in lexisnexis.com web server
Description: X-FRAME-OPTIONS, X-XSS-PROTECTION, X-CONTENT-TYPE-OPTIONS and CONTENT-SECURITY-POLICY headers were not sent by the server, which makes it vulnerable for various attack vectors

Title: Company IP address 172.185.18.72 appears on a blacklist
Description: Company IP address 198.185.18.72 appears on the "SORBS WEB", "RATS NoPtr" and " SORBS SPAM" blacklists. Further investigation is recommended.

Title: HTTP headers weakness in company-domain.jp web server
Description: X-FRAME-OPTIONS, X-XSS-PROTECTION, X-CONTENT-TYPE-OPTIONS and CONTENT-SECURITY-POLICY headers were not sent by the server, which makes it vulnerable for various attack vectors
